column4: my ethernet port is not recognised by ubuntu, and I have no ethernet interface. How can i make one?
what card?  "lspci | grep -i net" might tell you
05:00.0 Ethernet controller: Intel Corporation 82573L Gigabit Ethernet Controller
just google'd it myself :P Will read up, thanks
i'm getting an error when adding the given option. The error is that this option doesn't exist.
that would certainly explain your issue :)  Sorry i've never used that hardware before.  Best of luck.
as a single command try "sudo modprobe -r e1000 && sudo modprobe e1000 eeprom_bad_csum_allow=1" no quotes
I've already removed the module. should I re-load it?
just try the reload command then "sudo modprobe e1000 eeprom_bad_csum_allow=1"
do you know how I could get the list of options for a module?
are you getting the same thing ScottR4 did?
ummm not good - thus your question about "how to see module options" obviously.  Best of luck man!
